CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc North Hub?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc North Hub is arc {East Junction}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Grand Terminal?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Grand Terminal is arc {East Junction}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {East Junction} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {North Hub} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Grand Terminal to North Hub in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Grand Terminal to South Gate in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from East Junction to Valley Terminal in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between North Hub and East Junction in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between North Hub and East Junction is {91}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Grand Terminal and Valley Terminal in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Grand Terminal and Valley Terminal is {15}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from North Hub?
SC.A: The total flow output from North Hub is {126}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by East Junction?
SC.A: The total flow input by East Junction is {151}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 76? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {83} from {North Hub} to {East Junction}, a flow of {91} from {East Junction} to {North Hub}, a flow of {90} from {East Junction} to {Valley Terminal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 27? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {15} from {Grand Terminal} to {Valley Terminal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 35 and 68? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {45} from {South Gate} to {Grand Terminal}, a flow of {68} from {Valley Terminal} to {East Junction}, a flow of {43} from {North Hub} to {Grand Terminal}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from East Junction to North Hub or from North Hub to East Junction?
NC.A: The flow from {East Junction} to {North Hub} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Grand Terminal to South Gate, from South Gate to Grand Terminal, or from North Hub to Grand Terminal?
NC.A: The flow from {Grand Terminal} to {South Gate} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {East Junction}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {East Junction} and {North Hub}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Valley Terminal, Arc East Junction, Arc North Hub, Arc Grand Terminal, Arc South Gate}.
